2.plot: After the bankruptcy of the salon The beautiful women in Orvieto the hairdresser Luca Manfridi, together with Laura and her grandson, Claudia, comes into contact with a hairdresser on the outskirts of Rome, Jessica Lolli, and her two friends hope to find a stable job. Jessica works in her shop with boyfriend Samuele Marozzi, Sam, an ambitious, selfish, cynical guy who no longer wants to rout Jessica from the venue. Right in this room, Luca, Laura, Germana and Jessica decide to set up a company and open a hairdressing shop for ladies. Meanwhile Jessica meets a wealthy ...

3.plot: Evelina discovers that Carmel betrays her. Amareggiata and disappointed by love decides to engage with a wealthy man to be able to live on an annuity, he also hopes to conquer the beautiful Piero and to become rich. Evelina sincerely falls in love with Piero and begins to plan for their future. Then he meets various problems and is ready to not suffer Piero, he decides to leave him and pretend not to love him anymore. In Italy, Piero discovers the reality of things and reaches her. imdb.plot outline: The arrival of the economic crisis in the small town of Orvieto forces the salon for ladies The beautiful women of the closure. Disappointed and bitter, Luca decides to go to Rome in search of new perspectives along with her new friend Laura, a hairdresser in economic troubles who lives with a niece in the midst of teenage problems. The lives of the two characters overlap with those of the hairdressing Jessica, a girl disappointed in love by Sam, who finds a strong bond of friendship with Françoise's career architect and nice Germana, a bourgeois lady. The four women together with Luca found a new The beautiful women in the center of Rome. The story of the new salon is based on the events of the ambitious Annalisa Bottelli, Luca's former enemy.
